info.title: Shopping Cart API
info.description: A complete API for the Shopping Cart mini-project, built with Node.js, Express, and MySQL.

tags.name: Profile
tags.description: Manage the currently logged-in user's own profile

post.description: Creates a new user account. The default role will always be 'customer'.
Logs in a user (Customer or Admin) and returns a JWT token.

400.description: Email does not exist or password does not match

get.description: Returns the profile information for the currently logged-in user (Customer or Admin).

put.description: Updates the profile information (firstname, lastname, address, phone) for the currently logged-in user. Email and Role cannot be changed here.
Updates the password for the currently logged-in user after verifying the old password.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all user accounts in the system.
Retrieves a single user's information by their ID.

put.description: Updates a user's information, including their 'role'.

400.description: Missing required fields or email duplicate

delete.description: Deletes a user account. Admins cannot delete their own account via this endpoint.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all products for the shop (for Customers and Admins).

post.description: Creates a new product with image upload (must use `multipart/form-data`).

get.description: Retrieves a single product's details (for Customers and Admins).

put.description: Updates a product's details (must use `multipart/form-data` if changing the image).

delete.description: Deletes a product and its associated image file from the server.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all product categories (for Customers and Admins).
Retrieves a single category's details (for Customers and Admins).

put.description: Updates a category's name or description.

delete.description: Deletes a category. Products in this category will have their `category_id` set to NULL.

get.description: Retrieves all product statuses (e.g., Published, Draft).
Retrieves a single status by its ID.

put.description: Updates the name of a product status.

delete.description: Deletes a status. Products using this status will have their `status_id` set to NULL.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all orders from all users.

post.description: Creates a new order from the user's shopping cart. This action will deduct stock from products and is transactional.

400.description: Missing fields or cart is empty

500.description: Failed to create order (e.g., product is out of stock)

get.description: Retrieves the order history for the currently logged-in user.

200.description: A list of the user's orders

get.description: Retrieves the full details of a single order, including all line items. Admins can see any order; Customers can only see their own.

403.description: Forbidden (Not the owner of the order)

bearerAuth.description: Enter the JWT token obtained from login (must be prefixed with 'Bearer ')

UserUpdate.description: For an Admin to update a user's profile

ProfileUpdate.description: For a Customer to update their own profile

price.description: Price per item at time of purchase

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. Token is missing or invalid.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. User does not have the required permissions (e.g., Admin rights).

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found.
